translations: 肢解，割断手足；分割，瓜分

sentences.sentence: They wanted to dismember the company.
In my culture, I would be well within my rights to dismember you.
sentences.translation: 在我的文明里，我有权利来瓜分你这才是好的。

sentences.sentence: Dismember - This is the standard pole arm damage enhancing effect.
sentences.translation: 肢解-标准的武器伤害增强效果。
